Megatron leans over the speakers, "Of course we can trust him." He 
then builds into a growl, "Switchblade, do not scare potential 
Decepticon soldiers." He then closes the speakers, and quietly 
whispers to Astroblast. "It dosent matter if we can trust him or not, 
we will show him our way".
